Although Allen Iverson 's two free throws with 17.1 seconds left were the difference in a 101-100 victory, Theo Ratliff 's season-high 25 points and George Lynch's basket over 7-foot-6 Shawn Bradley were pivotal, too. Theo Ratliff was demanding the ball and we had to get it to him the way he was putting it in the hole, 76ers guard Aaron McKie said. Philadelphia's three-game losing streak appeared likely to grow as Dallas took a 10-point lead early in the fourth quarter. But a layup by Theo Ratliff with 1:22 left tied it at 97. Steve Nash
